Skill.source: Item:29:Shackles of the Wretched, Chain Gloves

PathOfBuilding.Notes:
!!!!!!!!!!!!!!Mandatory!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! Explody Body armour (Crusader i85+ body armour) Shackles of the Wretched ---> Herald of Thunder - Hextouch - Temporal chains - Flame dash (these must be socketed in the gloves!) --getting curse on hit ele weakness on here is a bonus but not mandatory Kaom's Roots (look for move speed corruption) Inspired Learning x2 (you must have 4 notables allocated within range, see passive tree) Curse Effect clusters --ilvl 50 minimum --ilvl 50 to 67 for best chances of rolling your own --6 passives mandatory --Dark Discourse grants 10% curse effect --25% increased effect will add 1% curse effect to each minor node Hat with 30% Temporal Chains Curse Effect (The Gull is amazing but $$$, using a rare is just fine) Solstice Vigil - Annoit can be a couple options, Magmatic Strikes can bring you to 100% conversion and is good damage The Signal Fire - you can corrupt for %phys added as extra fire/lightning 6L bow with 1G 3-4B 1-2R (you could swap Combustion out for Inspiration if needed) Cinderswallow Diamond Flask Quicksilver flask Watcher's Eye - Anger: Phys converted to Fire (note you could get by with just quiver+amulet annoit but I'd recommend the eye)
~~~~~~Really good~~~~~~~~ Hextouch and Temporal Chains with 23% quality, these gems both grant curse effect with quality Circle of Anguish Rings --look for %Fire damage and Buff Effect, getting both will be extremely expensive though --reduced mana reservation or resistance is pretty solid --Flammability on hit implicit is nice but not mandatory Taste of Hate
-----Leveling----- BV levels pretty well, just go grab some duration (Potency of Will) before you start self cursing.
